title: Popularity of Fidel Castro in Cuba 2015
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Very/somewhat negative has the highest Share of respondents and Don't know / no answer has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Very/somewhat negative has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Don't know / no answer.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Very/somewhat negative and lowest at Response Don't know / no answer.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Very/somewhat negative has the highest Share of respondents and Don't know / no answer has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Very/somewhat negative has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Don't know / no answer.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Very/somewhat negative and lowest at Response Don't know / no answer.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 44.0.
The Response Don't know / no answer has 1.5 times less Share of respondents than average.
